Name: Sprint Duration
Description: Length of a sprint in days

Name: Task Effort Estimate
Description: Estimated effort hours for a task

Name: Team Size
Description: Number of members in a team

Name: Story Points per Sprint
Description: Total story points planned per sprint

Name: Skill Level
Description: Level of a skill an employee has

Name: Availability Percentage
Description: Percentage availability of a team member

Name: Number of Features per Release
Description: Number of features included in a release

Name: Number of Sprints Used
Description: Number of sprints used to calculate velocity

Name: Task Completion Status
Description: Binary status of task completion (0=not done
